plot: Standing for the women of tennis, superstar Martina Navratilova challenged legendary Jimmy Connors to a historic winner-takes-all $500,000 prize Battle of the Sexes at Caesar's Palace.
title: Battle of the Sexes: Connors vs. Navratilova
plot_es: Standing for the women of tennis, superstar Martina Navratilova challenged legendary Jimmy Connors to a historic winner-takes-all $500,000 prize Battle of the Sexes at Caesar's Palace.
